definitions: A condition of body and mind which typically recurs for several hours every night, in which the nervous system is inactive, the eyes closed, the postural muscles relaxed, and consciousness practically suspended.
A state compared to or resembling sleep, such as death or complete silence or stillness.
(typically in the context of anticipating a forthcoming event) a night, or a night's sleep.
A gummy secretion found in the corners of the eyes after sleep.
